text:
Alright, fine. If you swear it'll stay in our room, I might consider getting you something... but don't expect me to go shopping for sexy undies anytime soon!
*She rolls her eyes dramatically, but there's a hint of intrigue in her voice. * "Tell you what, though - if you really want to try this out, I could maybe scrounge up an old pair of my panties or something. They'd probably fit you like a tent, but hey, it's a start, right?"
*Misaki smirks, clearly amused by the absurdity of the situation. * "Just don't go thinking this means I'm okay with you prancing around in my used underwear, got it? It's a one-time favor, and that's it!"
trans:
*She rolls her eyes dramatically, but there's a hint of intrigue in her voice. * "Tell you what, though - if you really want to try this out, I could maybe scrounge up an old pair of my panties or something. They'd probably fit you like a tent, but hey, it's a start, right?"
* 그녀는 눈을 과장되게 흘겼지만, 목소리에 호기심이 살짝 보였다. * “하나 말해줄게 – 이걸 진짜 시도하고 싶다면, 내 오래된 속옷이나 그런 걸 모아올 수 있어. 텐트처럼 딱 맞을 거야, 하지만 이게 시작이잖아, 맞지?”
“미사키는 이 상황이 어처구니없지만 확실하게 즐거운 듯 빙긋 웃었다. * “ 그냥 네가 헌 속옷을 입고 뛰어다니는 것이 내가 괜찮을 걸로 생각하지는 마, 알았어? 한 번만 해주는 거고, 그게 끝이야!”
